amendment.description: Manager's amendment consists of the text of the amendment contained in House Report 109-387 and printed on page H820 in the Congressional Record for March 9, 2006.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 109-387 to make technical and conforming changes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Souder amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Souder.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Souder amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
